|brand = SeeedStudio |model = BeagleBone |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = Green Gateway |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Z64-WL18SBMOD, |icid = 451I-WL18SBMOD |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Octavo Systems;OSD3358; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Octavo Systems;OSD3358;On chip; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = SMSC;LAN9512; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 98:5D:AD |oui = E0:62:34
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04;; |stockos = Linux;4.19.94;Debian 10
|exp_if_types = Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pad header,, J14
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, Micro SD Card slot, RTC, I2C, UART, SPI, CAN, GPIO, |addchip = Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Micrel;MIC2026-1YM;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = debian |defaultpass = temppwd |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/05/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Texas Instruments WL18MODGB |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Texas Instruments;WL1835MOD; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *CPU: ''[[Octavo Systems]]'' [https://octavosystems.com/octavo_products/osd335x/ OSD3358] (ARM Cortex-A8) SiP :Processor: [[TI]] ''Sitara'' AM3358 @1GHz (ARM Cortex-A8) :FPU: NEON floating-point accelerator (ARM Cortex-M3) :PRU: 2× 32-bit @200MHz programmable real-time units *RAM: 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 4GB (8-bit eMMC) on-board *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Type-A, 1x Micro USB 2.0 (OTG) *Grove Connectors: 2x (One I2C and One UART) *GPIO: 2x 46-pin headers *Ethernet: 1x FE ports *Power Source: 12V/1A DC via power jack or Micro-USB
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.seeedstudio.com/BeagleBone-Green-Gateway/ ''Seeed Studio BeagleBone® Green Gateway'' on '''SeeedStudio''' Wiki] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/beaglebone-green-gateway-sbc-offers-lan-and-wifi-too/ ''BeagleBone Green Gateway SBC offers LAN and WiFi too'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2019/07/31/beaglebone-green-gateway-octavo-osd3358-sip-ethernet-dc-jack/ ''BeagleBone Green Gateway SBC'' on '''CNX|Software''']
